website_summaries.verdict: Though it lacks a stylus and it won't fit everyone's lifestyle, the LG Optimus G Pro's beautiful touch screen and ultrafast CPU do this handset justice.
pros: The LG Optimus G Pro packs a sharp and crisp display, a blazing Snapdragon 600 quad-core processor, and Android Jelly Bean
cons: The Optimus G Pro's hefty size can be cumbersome to handle and it doesn't come with a stylus

customer_reviews.title: love android
customer_reviews.text: I had my E980 phone for "YEARS". I loved my android and miss it today. This phone worked for me until it literally died. The point is, I had this phone for at least 5 years maybe more. I had no choice but to upgrade as the apps today are installing on 6.0 and the android was only 4.2 I think. So many of my apps were no longer supported. But a great phone!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Jean

customer_reviews.title: Display is high quality and camera is also pretty good, though I don't take pictures that much ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in advertised condition (new) with all appropriate accessories. Phone is sleek, functions well and very intuitive design. Display is high quality and camera is also pretty good, though I don't take pictures that much so I wouldn't know. Screen fits well in my hand (I have pretty big hands) and the gyroscope is pretty fine-tuned -- I'm easily miffed if the phone rotates from portrait to landscape when I don't want it to. 4 stars for being high quality phone at decent price. It didn't blow me away, nor did it have a fantastically low price. If you want a nice shiny phone without the $400 price tag this can be it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase!!  FAILURE!!  RUN AWAY!!
customer_reviews.text: Not at ALL happy. I use straight talk. This had the SIM card for AT&T which was very hard to remove to put in the SIM card for straight talk, which in trying ruined the slot. A TOTAL FAIL. Didn't bother to send back. In the future I'll make SURE to NEVER buy from this seller!! It says it's unblocked which is NOT true!! Buyer BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Libby

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. The item has delivered much faster than the planed date and real genuine new as seller advertised. I appreciate the seller's good integrity as an on line merchant. Technically speaking on this phone, it is already well known as Samsung Galaxy Note II killer, we don't need mention anymore and any longer. This time is my second purchase in one month period for my family member upgrade. I dare to say this phone's real value is much more than its price. I have decided to buy this phone after watching many of the comparison reviews on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Neptuner9684

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this phone
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this phone. It's very big, but I keep it in my purse, so for me it's a bonus. Makes surfing the web, looking at pictures, and other tasks very easy. The camera is awesome in daytime, and nighttime as well as long as you keep a steady hand. This beast keeps a charge very well, and runs flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Soleil

customer_reviews.title: When you make or receive a call the screen goes black and you can't access the keyboard to do things like 1) hang up
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. When you make or receive a call the screen goes black and you can't access the keyboard to do things like 1) hang up, 2) enter a password, etc. If you Google it, it seems to be a common problem with this phone. I had a slim profile case on it, and the day I was going to return it I dropped it from about 3 ft on the driveway and the screen shattered. POS.

customer_reviews.title: i don't consider it the poor man's Note at all
customer_reviews.text: I simply couldn't justify the cost of a Note but after getting and working with this phone, i don't consider it the poor man's Note at all. The display is extremely bright and clear, very fast and the camera is good. I'm not a techie person so I won;t wax on about specs and such; read that for yourself. But if you want a big blazing phone, I recommend this one. There is only one downside I see and that this phone was initially for AT&T so there is a lot of their bloatware to wade through in terms of apps.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Rogers

customer_reviews.title: simply great
customer_reviews.text: great phone great screen good battery life and good sound. Hard to beat even if it is last years model. They have since released Pro G 2 but it has not hit USA yet. When it does it will likely be a killer phone as well. This one was AT&T branded so it has some bloatware to remove, but functionally and cosmetically perfect. They did not include the headset which is odd, but the price point was excellent. There are perhaps 4 or 5 other phones out there now which can compete, but most are at least an additional $100 dollars or more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camera takes amazing pictures, i wish for a faster shutter speed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for a few months now and don't have an concerns. The camera takes amazing pictures, i wish for a faster shutter speed, but it is only a phone. I have so much space, i don't know what to with. The videoes are amazing too!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and arrived on time!!!!!

Yes it is a year old but it is also 200 cheaper than the others. Most reviews are pretty accurate here. Yes it comes with 4.1.2 Jelly Bean I just wish I could somehow get an update to 4.4 kitkat. If anyone has recieved an update please let me know how you got it. I would really appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but it doesn't get updates
customer_reviews.text: I initially wrote a review on this phone sharing how much I love it. That is true, when new, I did love it. However, after 6 months, other phones were getting software update/upgrades. LG doesn't "push" these updates to unlocked phones. I had this phone for 3 years and never once was able to get an update. I've had a Moto 5 Plus for 1 year that has had 2 updates "pushed" to it already. I wouldn't recommend an LG phone if you are buying the unlocked version as it will not get updated.

product_meta.title: LG Optimus G Pro E980 32GB Unlocked GSM 4G LTE Android Smartphone with 13MP Camera, Android 4.1 and Quad-Core Processor (Black)
product_meta.description: An immersive 1080p Full HD display, enhanced processing power and a 13MP camera that allows you to capture unique memories with creative new features. BE THE PRODUCER. Use both front and back cameras to include the photographer in a window in the video. With a total of 4 extremely powerful 1.7 GHz cores inside, the Qualcomm SnapdragonTM 600 Processor-backed by 2GB of RAM-enhances the performance of the Optimus G Pro's many extraordinary features. With sharper graphics and quicker launching of all your apps, even with multiple tasks running simultaneously, this mighty new CPU has it covered with power to spare!
feature_bullets: 4G LTE 700 MHz Class 17 / 1700 / 2100, Dolby Mobile Sound Enhancement
5.5" True Full HD IPS Plus LCD Multi-Touchscreen w/ Corning Gorilla Glass 2 and LG Optimus UI v3.0
13 Megapixel Camera w/ Autofocus, LED flash, Geo-tagging, face detection, image stabilization, panorama, HDR + Front-Facing 2.1 Megapixel Camera; Dual-Video rec and HDR
Android v4.1 (Jelly Bean) OS, Prcoessor: Quad-core 1.7 GHz Krait 300, Chipset: Qualcomm APQ8064T Snapdragon 600
32GB Internal Memory Storage, 2GB RAM + a microSD slot for expandable memory up to 64GB

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars148 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Other camera features: Primary Camera: 13 MP, 4208 x 3120 pixels, autofocus, LED flash|Secondary Camera: 2.1 MP, 1080p@30fps
